attributes.action: Make allowing an injury causing dog on dog attack by an owner a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details:
Owners/responsible persons must be held accountable, under the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991, if their dog is allowed to attack another dog; where injuries are caused to the victim dog, by intentionally allowing their dog to cause harm to another dog or through recklessness.
#Lottieslaw
attributes.background: Lottie was attacked by a dog & suffered some horrific injuries.The attacking dog was not under the proper control of its owner/walker. Currently unless a person is in fear of being attacked by or is attacked by the attacking dog, the law does not consider dog on dog attacks to be a criminal offence.

rejection.details:
We're very sorry to hear about what happened to Lottie. We can't accept your petition because this one calls for something very similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258477
